about_the_game:
FutaDomWorld is an alternate-history dating-sim, set in an erotic dystopia.



FDW is science fiction; in the near future, genetic engineering has created an invasive breed of people with physiologically addictive semen. Naturally, things got weird.

As a male citizen of the Empire, you are oppressed and objectified at every turn. Your goal is to choose a futa mistress from among many, and seduce them… before someone else decides you might be better as their bimbo slave.

If you like power play, strong feminine characters, and deeply flawed people, we're off to a good start. If you also like dominant women with enormous cocks plundering innocent boys, then we have truly excellent news for you.



WARNING - The game deals heavily with themes of femdom, bondage, objectification, gender roles, mind control, dystopia, and slavery. There is also a really tremendous amount of butt stuff. Persons who are likely to be offended by any of these things should probably just give the game a pass, for everyones' sake.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS 10.8-10.14
  • Processor: 2+ Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel 3000HD or greater
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Optional, but recommended
  • Additional Notes: It's a visual novel. It is not very technically demanding.

reviews:
“Futadom World - Binding Sim is by far the flagship game of the futadom kink right now. To me, the writing is by far its best feature - there is extensive work put into world-building and character depth. Each character has their own distinct personality and motivations that are believable, and there's frequent crossover between all the paths depending on how far you are along with certain characters. The writing compliments the lewdness, of which there is a lot. They have lots of commissioned art and an in-house artist that really brings the whole thing together! The developers took some flack for slow development once upon a time, but after converting over to RenPy, this is no longer the case. There is regular game updates every few months [...] Definitely consider giving these guys your time and money. It's always refreshing to see adult game developers deliver on their word and it should be supported.”
5/5 – F95

“Hi so I just wanted to put this up here, this game is fucking amazing. The thing is i was here just for porn/ erotic games. My first play through was nice but that was pretty much what I expected. On my second play through I decided to romance something different. This took me on a emotional, narrative journey that legitimately made feel things my shriveled heart shouldn't be capable of any more. Half way into the story on this play through my erection went away because I was too focused on the actual story. I had no more interest in the erotic part of it as I did the emotional narrative being told with occasional very in depth, high quality pictures. Do not misunderstand that the game was not erotic any more at this point. Its only that the story was so well told and the characters despite the alien setting so believable and real that I was utterly absorbed. It was one of the most enjoyable and utterly unexpected experiences I have ever had with a video game that I wanted to go and tell my friends "Hey this is really good" But I don't have the sheer courage or lack of giving a fuck enough to tell them that I wanted to play a game that on the surface is about chicks with dicks dominating men (Most of my friends aren't gay or bi or whatever I am, my sexuality is honestly a moving target) And so i decided the next best thing I could do to share this experience was to make clear to anyone looking at this game, anyone interested in the basic concept of this game. This is the game for you, its great, its fun, its erotic and clever. Play it.”
5/5 – F95

“Holy cow this game is really cool funny and pretty. the artwork is stunning it has a lot of music for each character, different events. cool characters very interesting story (weird but cool) .the animations are beautiful (i really hope that they add sound for the animations). There are also 6 characters 6 happy endings and a lot of bad endings. I really love the game+its dialogue (thumbs up)”
5/5 – F95
short_description: FutaDomWorld is a dystopian, futanari-femdom dating sim. Let's get weird.
